subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joe Crede and Paul Konerko hit grand slams to back Javier Vázquez’s strong start, and the host Chicago White Sox beat the struggling Detroit Tigers, 11-0, on Sunday.
snippet: Joe Crede and Paul Konerko hit grand slams to back Javier Vázquez’s strong start, and the host Chicago White Sox beat the struggling Detroit Tigers, 11-0, on Sunday.
